pages.text: You can craft a multitude of different kinds of wagons to suit your needs. Wagons generally come in all wood types, if applicable, and each have different stats.

$(l)Controls:$()$(br2)-Lead a pulling animal, such as a horse, to the wagon and shift-right-click the wagon to hitch it. $(br2)-Leash the horse again to un-hitch it. $(br2)-Lead a NON-pulling animal, such as a pig, to the wagon and shift-right-click the wagon to put the animal inside.

$(l)Controls:$() $(br2)-Right click the wagon with any (vanilla) planks to change it's wood type. $(br2)-Right click the wagon with an axe to pick it up intact. $(br2)-Hit the wagon with an axe to destroy it and get scraps back.
$(l)Pull Types$()$(br2)Large: Horses, Mules, Oxen, Camels, Caribou, Unicorns $(br2)Medium: Donkeys, Mules, Caribou $(br2)Small: Donkeys, Goats, Dogs, Wolves
